name: Evil Nun Maze: Endless Escape
description:
A new and different way to experience the Evil Nun universe.

How did the Nun become such an unpleasant being?

The game takes place between the events of Evil Nun 2 and Evil Nun 1. You will play as William Bismarch and Sister Madeline has just turned into an evil being with a thirst for revenge.

Some features:

- Escape from Evil Nun in the Eagle's Junior High School classes

- The mazes and puzzles are randomly generated so that each floor is different and unique.

- Improve your skills using the coins you get completing mazes.

- Find out where your limits are by overcoming the most difficult mazes.
